name: The Answer (biaxthepanda)
description:
This game is made for  for Epic MegaJam 2022 in one week by one person.

The Answer is a puzzle platformer game where you try to find the ultimate answer to the life artificially creted humanoid creature. To find it you'll be trying to reach the peak of the human intelligence which is only possible if your form on this realm and the form in the realm of thought unite together.

A & D to Move Left and Right

SPACE to jump

R to Restart the current level

P to Skip to next level , O to go back to previous level (added them just for the sake of the gamejam, dont use them unless you're too stuck)

Animations from Mixamo, 2 Materials from Quixel Bridge, Footstep SFX from freesound

Other than those, every asset (models,SFX,soundtrack,materials) has been created by me in the mean of jam time.
